Class ec.util.Option 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.util.Option
public class Option
extends Object
A simple wrapper for an option key plus possible value. If there is no value, it is left as null.

key
The key.
value
The value.

Option(String, String)
Construct an Option with the given key and value.

key 
 public final String key
The key.

value 
 public final String value
The value.

Option 
 public Option(String theKey,
               String theValue)
Construct an Option with the given key and value.

Parameters:
theKey - the key
theValue - the value
